svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
July 22, 2023" date: "2023-07-22"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Summary by Tim Beiko . Notes
from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : Dencun testing continues with devnet 7 and a
Sepolia shadow fork Client teams implementing Dencun EIPs ready for devnet 8 EIP6780
(selfdestruct only in same tx) edge cases clarification, burn used by some L2s
Discussions on adding parent beacon block roots to execution payload, adding
getBlockReceipts & removing mining from Execution API and standardizing JWT location
EIP/ERC repo split ( EIP7329 ): core devs in favor, Greg Colvin (EIP editor) still
opposed
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Summary by Tim Beiko . Notes
from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim :
* Dencun testing continues with devnet 7 and a Sepolia shadow fork
Dencun testing continues with devnet 7 and a Sepolia shadow fork
* Client teams implementing Dencun EIPs ready for devnet 8
Client teams implementing Dencun EIPs ready for devnet 8
* EIP6780 (selfdestruct only in same tx) edge cases clarification, burn used by some
L2s
EIP6780 (selfdestruct only in same tx) edge cases clarification, burn used by some L2s
* Discussions on adding parent beacon block roots to execution payload, adding
* EIP/ERC repo split ( EIP7329 ): core devs in favor, Greg Colvin (EIP editor) still
* KZG Ceremony 122k contributions, lobby closes July 23 (tomorrow!)
KZG Ceremony 122k contributions, lobby closes July 23 (tomorrow!)
Prague + Electra upgrade
* EIP7251 FAQ : would allow more than 32 ETH to be staked
EIP7251 FAQ : would allow more than 32 ETH to be staked
* Suggest a name for the Prague + Electra upgrade
Suggest a name for the Prague + Electra upgrade
Layer 1
* Ben Edgington: Upgrading Ethereum book new sections on LMD GHOST & Casper FFG
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.9.2 : hotfix for gossip blocks with unknown block
parent errors and changed block production wait cutoff Nimbus v23.7.0 : validator
client optimisations and improves validator performance Teku v23.6.2 : minor bug fixes
and dependencies updates
Consensus layer:
* Lodestar v1.9.2 : hotfix for gossip blocks with unknown block parent errors and
changed block production wait cutoff
Lodestar v1.9.2 : hotfix for gossip blocks with unknown block parent errors and
* Nimbus v23.7.0 : validator client optimisations and improves validator performance
Nimbus v23.7.0 : validator client optimisations and improves validator performance
* Teku v23.6.2 : minor bug fixes and dependencies updates
Teku v23.6.2 : minor bug fixes and dependencies updates
* Execution layer: Nethermind v1.20.1 : fix for v1.20.0 which caused Prysm error Reth
v0.1.0-alpha.4 : removed downloader heuristic preventing syncing, jemallocator default
on UNIX and added transaction pool maintenance metrics
Execution layer:
* Nethermind v1.20.1 : fix for v1.20.0 which caused Prysm error
Nethermind v1.20.1 : fix for v1.20.0 which caused Prysm error
* Reth v0.1.0-alpha.4 : removed downloader heuristic preventing syncing, jemallocator
default on UNIX and added transaction pool maintenance metrics
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.4 : removed downloader heuristic preventing syncing, jemallocator
For Stakers
* Staking directory : directory of staking providers
Research
* Data availability sampling (DAS) eprint : prove existing constructions secure,
propose new constructions with benchmark & trade-offs
Data availability sampling (DAS) eprint : prove existing constructions secure, propose
new constructions with benchmark & trade-offs
* Threshold encrypted transaction pools : tradeoffs of using for MEV mitigation
Threshold encrypted transaction pools : tradeoffs of using for MEV mitigation
Layer 2
* Celo propose rollup migration , initially OP Stack, decentralized sequencer using
Celo’s validator set, offchain data availability via Eigen Layer and 1-block finality
Celo propose rollup migration , initially OP Stack, decentralized sequencer using
* zkSync Era shadow testing Boojum (STARK-based proof system)
zkSync Era shadow testing Boojum (STARK-based proof system)
* Mantle (optimistic rollup) alpha is live
Mantle (optimistic rollup) alpha is live
* Consensys Linea (zk rollup) alpha is live
Consensys Linea (zk rollup) alpha is live
* L2BEAT: upgrade process of L2s [PDF]
L2BEAT: upgrade process of L2s [PDF]
EIPs/Standards
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7336 : Interactive across multiple registries ERC7361 :
Metadata hash with decentralized validation (ERC721 extension)
* ERC7336 : Interactive across multiple registries
ERC7336 : Interactive across multiple registries
* ERC7361 : Metadata hash with decentralized validation (ERC721 extension)
ERC7361 : Metadata hash with decentralized validation (ERC721 extension)
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Mimic v3
Mimic v3 is a platform that helps you model and automate operations in DeFi.
Do you need:
* Recurring payments
Recurring payments
* To collect fees across various chains?
To collect fees across various chains?
* To automate your portfolio rebalancing?
To automate your portfolio rebalancing?
Mimic gives you a customizable workflow with modular cross-chain connectors. Request a
demo .
Trusted by top-tier projects such as Trust Wallet, Balancer, ParaSwap, and
Decentraland. Backed by Starbloom Ventures.
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.8.21 : Language features: access events from other contracts & immutable
variable initialization restrictions relaxed Addresses “stack too deep” errors for
unoptimized code from IR-based code generation Bug fixes: legacy code generation
always generate code for expression in <expression>.selector and Yul optimizer
FullInliner evaluation order website makeover
Solidity v0.8.21 :
* Language features: access events from other contracts & immutable variable
initialization restrictions relaxed
Language features: access events from other contracts & immutable variable
* Addresses “stack too deep” errors for unoptimized code from IR-based code generation
Addresses “stack too deep” errors for unoptimized code from IR-based code generation
* Bug fixes: legacy code generation always generate code for expression in
<expression>.selector and Yul optimizer FullInliner evaluation order
Bug fixes: legacy code generation always generate code for expression in
* website makeover
website makeover
* Create a stake & reward contract
Create a stake & reward contract
* Reproduce a simple MEV attack in Solidity using Hardhat or Foundry
Reproduce a simple MEV attack in Solidity using Hardhat or Foundry
* Guide to fuzzing onchain contracts with Echidna
Guide to fuzzing onchain contracts with Echidna
* Sothis v0.4.0 : replay historical state on a local Anvil/Hardhat node
Sothis v0.4.0 : replay historical state on a local Anvil/Hardhat node
* The Graph: Substreams-powered subgraphs
The Graph: Substreams-powered subgraphs
* Secureum A-MAZE-X CTF solutions
Secureum A-MAZE-X CTF solutions
* Celer Brevis : zk co-processing & data attestation SDKs, alpha
Celer Brevis : zk co-processing & data attestation SDKs, alpha
Security
* Conic Finance $3 million exploit via read-only reentrancy
Conic Finance $3 million exploit via read-only reentrancy
* Immunefi: top ten common vulnerabilities
Immunefi: top ten common vulnerabilities
Ecosystem
* EthCC: Videos by stage: main , Eiffel , Versailles , Bastille , Notre Dame , Louvre
& Saint Victor EthCC 2024 will be in Brussels
EthCC:
* Videos by stage: main , Eiffel , Versailles , Bastille , Notre Dame , Louvre & Saint
Victor
Videos by stage: main , Eiffel , Versailles , Bastille , Notre Dame , Louvre & Saint
* EthCC 2024 will be in Brussels
EthCC 2024 will be in Brussels
* Etherscan advanced filter updates
Etherscan advanced filter updates
Notable at app layer
* Aave GHO (overcollateralized stablecoin) live on mainnet, Aave v3 supplied assets
used as collateral
Aave GHO (overcollateralized stablecoin) live on mainnet, Aave v3 supplied assets used
as collateral
* UniswapX (aggregator): gas-free swaps with MEV protection & no cost for failed
transactions, beta
UniswapX (aggregator): gas-free swaps with MEV protection & no cost for failed
* Ajna (lending) live on mainnet, no governance or external price feeds
Ajna (lending) live on mainnet, no governance or external price feeds
* OpenSea Deals : create offers to swap NFTs for NFTs & WETH
OpenSea Deals : create offers to swap NFTs for NFTs & WETH
* Mint.fun (NFT minting) adds support for NFTs on Optimism & Zora
Mint.fun (NFT minting) adds support for NFTs on Optimism & Zora
Job Listings
* EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek ZK circuits engineer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Financial Stability Board (FSB) recommended framework for crypto assets
Financial Stability Board (FSB) recommended framework for crypto assets
* UK Financial Conduct Association (FCA) guidance warns memes can breach promotion
rules
UK Financial Conduct Association (FCA) guidance warns memes can breach promotion rules
* France issues crypto license to Societe Generale Forge to buy/sell, exchange &
custody assets
France issues crypto license to Societe Generale Forge to buy/sell, exchange & custody
assets
* Nasdaq halts plans for crypto custody service due to US regulatory environment
Nasdaq halts plans for crypto custody service due to US regulatory environment
Evan’s new podcast: web3 Builders
* Subscribe to web3 Builders podcast. First episode should drop this week, there may
be advantages to subscribing. 👀
General
* Gnosis Pay : payment network on Gnosis chain L2 with linked Visa Debit card
Gnosis Pay : payment network on Gnosis chain L2 with linked Visa Debit card
* GitHub social engineering attacks , using repo invites & malicious npm dependencies
GitHub social engineering attacks , using repo invites & malicious npm dependencies
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-july-22-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jul 23 – KZG Ceremony closes
Jul 23 – KZG Ceremony closes
* Jul 23 – Devconnect scholars application deadline
Jul 23 – Devconnect scholars application deadline
* Aug 4-18 – ETHGlobal Superhack virtual
Aug 4-18 – ETHGlobal Superhack virtual
* Aug 11-13 – ETHMunich hackathon
Aug 11-13 – ETHMunich hackathon
* Aug 15-16 – ETHToronto & ETHWomen
Aug 15-16 – ETHToronto & ETHWomen
* Aug 15-29 – Gitcoin Grants 18
Aug 15-29 – Gitcoin Grants 18
* Aug 16-19 – Ethereum Argentina (Buenos Aires)
Aug 16-19 – Ethereum Argentina (Buenos Aires)
* Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
* Aug 31 - Sep 3 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
Aug 31 - Sep 3 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
* Sep 1-3 – Ethcon Korea hackathon
Sep 1-3 – Ethcon Korea hackathon
* Sep 7-9 – ETHAccra hackathon
Sep 7-9 – ETHAccra hackathon
* Sep 10-12 – Ethereum Singapore hackathon & conference
Sep 10-12 – Ethereum Singapore hackathon & conference
* Sep 11-13 – DappCon (Berlin)
Sep 11-13 – DappCon (Berlin)
* Sep 15 – Protocol Berg (Berlin)
Sep 15 – Protocol Berg (Berlin)
* Sep 15-17 – ETHChicago conference & hackathon
Sep 15-17 – ETHChicago conference & hackathon
* Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
* Oct 5-6 – ETHMilan conference
Oct 5-6 – ETHMilan conference
* Oct 6-8 – ETHRome hackathon
Oct 6-8 – ETHRome hackathon
* Oct 6-27 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Oct 6-27 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
* Oct 13-15 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
Oct 13-15 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
* Oct 27-29 – ETH Miami festival & hackathon
Oct 27-29 – ETH Miami festival & hackathon
* Oct 31 – Road to Devcon grants application deadline
Oct 31 – Road to Devcon grants application deadline
* Nov 3-5 – ETH Lisbon hackathon
Nov 3-5 – ETH Lisbon hackathon
* Nov 3-5 – ETHBrno
Nov 3-5 – ETHBrno
* Nov 13-19 – Devconnect (Istanbul)
Nov 13-19 – Devconnect (Istanbul)
* Nov 17-19 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
Nov 17-19 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
